titleStmt.title: SII 7.889: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 889. (A.R. No. 261 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭaṉtaiyum poṟceyap pāvaiyu
m cīrttaṉic celviyum taṉ perunteviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutiyil Ūḻiyuḷ Iṭaiytuṟai
nāṭun tuṭarvaṉavelip paṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumura
ṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porutaṭa rīḻattaraicar tam muṭiyum Āṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻi
l muṭiyu muṉṉavarpakkaṟ ṟeṉṉavar vaitta cuntaramuṭiyum Intira ṉāramun teṇ
ṭirai Īḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatum Eṟipaṭaik keraḷar muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kula
taṉamākiya palarpukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatir velait tolperuṅkāva
ṟ palpaḻantīyvu māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripatmarāṉa śrīrājentraco
ḷadevarkku yāṇṭu 6Āvatu malāṭāṉa jaṉanātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu marutūr Ūro
m tirukkovalūrt tiruvīraṭṭāṉamuṭaiya mahādevar tirunan=tavāṉam Irājentracoḷaṉ
nan=tavāṉakkuṭikaḷ muvarkku nilanivan=tamāka nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷur Irā
javijjātirappererikkiḻ potunilamāṉa nilattukkuk kiḻpāṟkellai peruñcāttakkā
vatikaḷ koṟpāṭṭukku meṟkun teṉpāṟkellai paḷḷiccan=tam Iyakkipaṭṭikku vaṭakku me
lpāṟkellai Eṭṭikaḷ koṟpāṭṭukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Eriniṉṟuṅ kiḻakkunokkip
pon=ta peruvāykkālukkut teṟkum Ivvicaitta perunāṉkellaiyu ḷakappaṭṭa nilam pa
tiṉaṟucāṇkolāl Irunūṟ ṟaimpattāṟu kuḻi koṇṭa torumāvāka kuḻi Āyirattu toḷāyirattu Irupatiṉāl nila
m Eḻumāvarai Iṉṉila meḻumāvaraikku van=ta vilaidravyamum Iṟaidravyamum Iddevar śrīpaṇṭāratte yaṟa
kkoṇṭu Iṉṉilañ can=tirātittaval Iṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom marutūr Ūrom Iṉṉila
ttukku muṉpu nīr pāyum paricey miyñīruṅ kiṇīrum pāyappeṟuvatākavum Iṉṉilattukku veṭṭi
vetiṉai Amañci kāṭṭappeṟātomāka Ipparicu Iṟaiyiliyāka viṟṟukkuṭuttom marutūr Ūrom I
ttirunan=ta vāṉattut tiruppaḷḷittāmam Ittirunan=tavāṉakkuṭikaḷ muvarum paṟit taṭṭakkaṭavārkaḷā
kavum Ipparicu Ittirunan=tavāṉañ ceyviyttu Ittirunan=tavāṉakkuṭikaḷ muvarkku
can=ti rātittaval Iṟaiyili nilanivan=tamāka Iddevar śrīpaṇṭārattey Iṉṉilattu
kku veṇṭum vilaidravyamum Iṟaidravyamuṅ kuṭuppittu nivan=tañ ceyvittā
ṉ coḻamaṇṭalattu Arumoḻitevavaḷanāṭṭu maṅkalanāṭṭu
Iḷamaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ niccal śrīyārur Itu patmāheśvara ra
kṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.889 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
